name: Shoot'n'Shrink
description:
Hello everyone

This was my first student's project so far. 

My Goal was to create a Two player Local mini-game where the goal is to be the first one who hit the opponent 3 times.

You have Power-ups on the Map.

The Point is after each hit you get, you're going to shrink. So it's harder for your enemy to hit you again.

All Assets,  where used are under the  non-commercial aspect and only for educational purpose.
